About me

Since I created my first code snipped in JavaScript I have discovered my passion for programming. I have fully rearranged my life, spending months on everyday learning, sharpening my therotical and programing skills. This journey has proved to myself that I am a quick and dedicated learner, always striving for accuracy, excellence and efficiency.

Core principles of my projects: minimalism, easy to navigate content, optimization.
